title: Weather API Project
description: A Three.js scene that fetches and displays weather data from the OpenWeather API for Vancouver.
threejs: A JavaScript 3D library that allows for creating and displaying animated 3D graphics in a web browser.

title: Matter.js Plinko
description: A physics-based Plinko game built with Matter.js physics engine.
threejs: A 2D physics engine for the web that can simulate rigid bodies and their interactions.

title: 3D Bedroom Scene
description: An interactive 3D bedroom scene created with Three.js.
threejs: A JavaScript 3D library that makes WebGL simpler, allowing for the creation of GPU-accelerated 3D animations.

title: Music Visualizer
description: A Three.js music visualizer that reacts to audio input using the Web Audio API.
threejs: A JavaScript 3D library used here to create visual effects that respond to audio analysis.
